Arshan.title: Arshan
Arshan.byline: Arshan (Russian: Арша́н ahr-SHAHN) is a small hot spring resort located at the foot of the Sayan Mountains in Buryatia.

Arslanbob.title: Arslanbob
Arslanbob.byline: Arslanbob (Kyrgyz: Арстанбаб; Russian: Арсланбоб) is a small village in Kyrgyzstan, near Jalal-Abad.
